title: Looking for bronze ADC main
body: I've been maining support for a while now and am always paired up with terrible ADCs who don't communicate well. You don't have to be great yourself, just someone who I can play on skype with and climb the solo Q ladder.

replies.body: im a decent adc main... u wanna duo? i got a decent vayne (5 kda), jinx (10kda), cait (5kda) and i can cs pre well... about 100cs at 12min average and with a average 200-300 cs per game. but this is new season stats
You're on the NA server xD, sorry to break it to you

I main ADC but I reply heavily on my Support C:
but I can skype you
If you can CS then you're in. ^_^
i will duo with u on skype
